Agent.PlatformOps - Class in bgu.dcr.az.api
this class contains all the "hidden but public" methods, because the user should extend the agent class all the "platform" operations can be called mistakenly by him, instead of making those operations private and then access them via reflection - which will create a decrease in the performance - we just hide them in this inner class.
Agent.PlatformOps() - Constructor for class bgu.dcr.az.api.Agent.PlatformOps
